name: Ranged Disarm
summary: When using a simple firearm, you can shoot objects right out of your enemy's hands.
description:
When using a simple firearm, you can shoot objects right out of your enemy's hands. Attempt to Disarm the target using a ranged attack roll with your simple firearm, instead of attempting an Athletics check against the target's Reflex DC.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
